CHAT.comment: CHAT format needs to be double-checked
screen time is elapsed time from beginning of visit in min:sec

u.a: C points at side of house
C points at several places on house
C picks up lid to teapot
C pours from teapot in frying pan
C pours from teapot in a cup
C hands M a cup into which he poured from teapot
C picks up a pot and spoon
C puts small comtainer in front of himself
M takes a bite of food
leans forward and takes spoon out of C's mouth
C opens a book and turns pages; C puts his hand on a second book
C continues to turn pages on book in front of him
C and M are looking at back cover picture
C pushes second book toward M
M opens book; C opens nursery rhyme book watches M
M taps page with her finger
C stares at nursery rhyme book in which he has been turning pages without really looking
M turns page of Care_bears book; C gets to end of nursery rhyme book; closes it
C picks up first book again
M points to a different part of page
M puts her hand on first book
C picks up Care_bear feelings book again
